item.description:
http://www.kenherbst....

What: Ken Herbst Photography Studio Open House
When: Saturday, February 10, 12:00 PM
Where: 840 Summer Street, Boston MA 02127

ORGANIZER: Eileen (I?m posting this for a friend (Ken) and will not be able to make it)
CONTACT: eaconway@yahoo.com
TARGET AUDIENCE: All Members

Ken Herbst is opening up his photo gallery to the public (12pm-6pm). Cheese and wine will be served. This is a great chance to find out how to start your own studio/shop. Pick Ken?s brain and check out his work from fashion photography, nature through commercial work and more.

In addition, to framed and unframed photographs you will also be able to view from a resident artist and consultants who craft earrings, skin care products and candles. Colleen, from my social group, is working on getting a person from The Traveling Vineyard for wine tasting. ?Everything is more fun with wine.? Original art and photography, jewelry, luxurious bath products, candles and wine...

Please feel free to drop in any time between Noon to 6pm

Preview some original Ken Herbst photography: http://www.kenherbst....
item.name: Ken Herbst Photography Studio Open House
